name: SnackTrack Food Tracker
shortDescription: The Food Expiry Tracker System is a full-stack web application designed to help users monitor food items and receive the expiry state, reducing food waste effectively.

featureDetails.addItems: Add new food items with quantity, unit, category, storage location, and expiry date
featureDetails.countdown: Countdown timer in the Food Details page showing time left before expiry
featureDetails.trackInventory: Track food inventory and expiry timeline
featureDetails.notesSection: Notes section for each food item with timestamp
featureDetails.responsiveUI: Responsive and animated UI with Framer Motion

name: Roomatch – Roommate Finder Platform
shortDescription: Roomatch is a full-stack roommate matching platform allowing users to post listings, browse roommate profiles, and connect through blogs and comments in a secure, modern interface.

featureDetails.responsiveDesign: Fully responsive design with collapsible sidebar
featureDetails.likeSystem: Like system for roommate posts with dynamic count
featureDetails.commentsSection: Comments section for user interaction on details pages
featureDetails.homepageSections: Homepage sections including Banner slider, About section with Lottie, Featured Cards, Recently Viewed, and How-to Guide
featureDetails.alertsNotifications: Alerts and notifications with react-hot-toast and sweetalert
featureDetails.dynamicTitles: Dynamic page titles based on routes

name: Plant SU – Indoor Plant Shop
shortDescription: Plant SU is a modern, responsive indoor plant shop designed to help users bring nature into their home effortlessly, featuring a curated plant collection, reviews, and smooth delivery.

featureDetails.responsiveDesign: Fully mobile-friendly layout using Tailwind CSS for a modern look
featureDetails.indoorPlantCollection: Browse a variety of indoor plants suitable for different living spaces
featureDetails.userReviews: Real feedback from customers to help choose the right plant
featureDetails.fastDelivery: Fast and reliable delivery ensuring fresh and healthy plants
featureDetails.easyNavigation: Intuitive interface for smooth browsing and shopping experience
